sentences.en: a boat propelled by a small motor
China's booming energy demand has helped propel world oil prices.
sentences.cn: 中国激增的能源需求帮助推高了全球油价.

sentences.en: Its fuel cells , costing about $ 12 , 000 each , now propel small drones.
sentences.cn: 为此AMI获得了国防部50万美元的奖金.

sentences.en: One of our students was unable to propel her wheelchair up the ramp.
sentences.cn: 我们有名学生无法把她的轮椅推上坡道。

sentences.en: Paddles are used especially to propel canoes and kayaks.
sentences.cn: 短桨特别用于划独木舟和小艇.

sentences.en: Their emotions can propel market trends or send them into reversals.
sentences.cn: 他们的情绪会推动市场趋势或让市场反转.

sentences.en: They try to propel the watercrafts with paddles.
sentences.cn: 他们试着用桨推动船只.

sentences.en: They use oars to propel boats.
This is helping propel macro - prudential measures to the top of the regulatory debate, and rightly so.
sentences.cn: 这导致宏观审慎措施被推到了监管辩论的最前沿, 而且这么做没错.

sentences.en: To propel ( a ball ) by means of a punt.
sentences.cn: 踢用踢的方式来驱策 ( 球 )

sentences.en: To propel ( a boat ) with a pole.
To propel ( a watercraft ) with paddles or a paddle.
sentences.cn: 用浆划动用船桨推动 ( 船只 )

sentences.en: To propel something, especially a ball, in a high arc.
sentences.cn: 将(球)高击:将某物, 尤指球, 推入高弧线.

sentences.en: We can accomplish humanism management through various means and propel enterprise's innovation forward.
sentences.cn: 可以通过多种途径实现企业内的人本管理,以此推动企业创新.

sentences.en: We must develop industries with local advantages and propel the development of key areas.
sentences.cn: 积极发展有特色的优势产业,推进重点地带开发.

sentences.en: Y - shaped stick with elastic between the arms ; used to propel small stones.
sentences.cn: 一种Y形的小木棍,上边两丫之间有一条橡皮筋; 常用来射出小石块(以攻击别人).

words.tran_cn: 推进物；推进燃料；发射火药
推动者；推进物；推进燃料
[航][船] 螺旋桨；推进者；[航][船] 推进器

trans.tran_en: to move, drive, or push something forward
to move, drive, or push something forward
